features.description: The features that the guide requires

publicationDate.description: The guide publication date. It should follow the format YYYY-MM-DD

minimumJavaVersion.description: If the guide needs a minimum Java version, define it here.

maximumJavaVersion.description: If the guide needs a maximum Java version, define it here.

cloud.description: The cloud service provider of the guide

skipGradleTests.description: Set it to true to skip running the tests for the Gradle applications for the guide

skipMavenTests.description: Set it to true to skip running the tests for the Maven applications for the guide

tags.description: List of tags added to the guide. features are added automatically as tags. No need to repeat them here

buildTools.description: By default the code in the guide is generated for Gradle and Maven. If a guide is specific only for a build tool, define it here

testFramework.description: The guide's test framework. By default Java and Kotlin applications are tested with JUnit5 and Groovy applications with Spock

zipIncludes.description: List of additional files with a relative path to include in the generated zip file for the guide

slug.description: The guide's slug. If not specified, the guides folder is used.

publish.description: Whether the guide should be published, it defaults to true. You can set it to false for draft or base guides.

base.description: Defaults to null; if set, indicates directory name of the base guide to copy before copying the current one

name.description: The app's name. For single application guides, the application needs to be named default.

packageName.description: The app's package name. It you don't specify, the package name example.micronaut is used

framework.description: The app's framework. Default is Micronaut

features.description: The Micronaut Starter features' name that the app requires

excludeTest.description: The tests that should not be run
